page.title: 15CLUBS IN BIRCH
page.content:
{FOR YOUNG PEOPLE CUBS meet in the Village Hall every Monday at 6.00pm. {SCOUTS}meet in the Village Hall every Wednesday at 7.30pm. {PLAYGROUP}meets in the Village Hall three mornings each week. {YOUTH CLUB}meets in the Village Hall.
{FOR ADULTS {BIRCH SOCIETY}meets monthly in the school and promotes the well being of the whole area. Arranges W.E.A. lectures, talks, films, visits, etc. {WOMENS INSTITUTE}meets monthly in the Village Hall. {GET TOGETHER CLUB}(over 60's) meets monthly in the Village Hall.
